[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/exp/281/NotableThreads.png[/img]
ariana[/align]


[b][color=white][u]Announcement Threads[/u][/color][/b]
[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5232199][b]Instagram MyCode[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color] Omniscient has recently added a new Instagram MyCode to Hack Forums. We all know what you are thinking! You guessed it, everyone now has to chance to share pictures of their grande lattes from Starbucks!

[b][color=white][u]Informational Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5229049][b]Truth Behind Razor + Kenny Raids INCLUDING PRIVATE CHATS and LEAK INFORMATION[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3017782][color=#EFEFEF][b]TheEntrepreneur[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color] With help from, TheEntrepreneur those interested in learning more about the Razor Crypt raids, can do so here.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5217619][b]Cin's Date Model[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1221196][color=#EFEFEF][b]King Cin[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color] User King Cin assists more users in the Innuendo forum with another helpful thread. Need help planning a date? Come check this thread out!

[b][color=white][u]Entertaining Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5230858][b]Well, the cat's out of the bag. I'm Mr Kewl[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=182754][color=#EFEFEF][b]Orgy[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Orgy has created a fun little thread informing the community that he is actually the member, Mr Kewl.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5226752][b]Installed the dildo shift knob (admins pls no delete its not bad.)[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1093501][color=#EFEFEF][b]Zexo[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]The user Zexo created a thread showing off his peculiar knew shift knob for his car. What do you think about it?

[b][color=white][u]Contests and Giveaways[/u][/color][/b]

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5231411][b]Stazzy's $50 Upgrade/Award Giveaway[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1813061][color=#EFEFEF][b]Stazzy[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]The member Stazzy is offering a very generous giveaway, where users can decide between an award or an upgrade. Come check it out now!

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5219122][b]Legalize It / Rich Bitch Giveaway / Gift Award | 2 Winners | other shit idk just join[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2033319][color=#EFEFEF][b]♋ Goat ♋[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]♋ Goat ♋ is giving away various different awards to a few lucky members. Come test your luck today!

[b][color=white][u]Member Feedback Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5226881][b]Post-Staff Thoughts and Feedback[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1093501][color=#EFEFEF][b]Roger Waters[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Ex-Staff, Roger Waters, goes into his perspective explaining how the site has changed over the years.

[b][color=white][u]Miscellaneous[/u][/color][/b]

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5230237][b]new donation from Red Lions group to HF 1200 $[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=80618][color=#EFEFEF][b]nokia2mon2[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Leader of the Red Lions, nokia2mon2, makes a return on Hack Forums, donating another $1200 to the site!

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5126144][b]My YouTube Journey | Drop Zone | Started January 2016[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1610871][color=#EFEFEF][b]Rʏᴀɴ Rᴇʏɴᴏʟᴅs ❤️[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Come checkout the progress that Rʏᴀɴ Rᴇʏɴᴏʟᴅs ❤️ has made with his YouTube channel. He's come along very far since he started back in January!
posts.subject: Hack Forums News // Edition 287

[url=http://discountvrheadsets.com/latest-news/star-wars-battlefront-experience/][b][color=white]Star Wars Battlefront Experience VR[/color][/b][/url]
If you were one of the lucky people out there who had the chance to purchase a new Virtual Reality machine back in February from Steam, your device should have arrived already. If it has, you most likely tested it out and showed off to your friends your new cool gadget. If you purchased the device from Sony, which will be released sometime in October, get your list ready for new games to try out! The new Star Wars Battlefront has been selected as one of the titles that will be playable on the latest VR gadget that Sony has to offer. Sony states that they are working with EA, DICE, Disney, and Lucasfilm to make the game come to life and be as realistic as it can be. Players hooked up to VR devices will also be able to play with console players too! Sony Interactive Entertainment states that "it's going to be very different than the PlayStation 4 game." Who does not want to be a Jedi or a Stormtrooper in 3D? That is epic!

[url=http://www.digitalspy.com/gaming/feature/a789443/titanfall-2-ps4-release-date-news-rumours-trailers-story/][b][color=white]Titanfall 2 Details Released[/color][/b][/url]
Respawn Entertainment, the developers known for creating the multiplayer first-person shooter game, Titanfall will be releasing a sequel sometime in March 2017. Titanfall 2 has been confirmed to be a cross-platform title, and will be introducing its latest game to the PS4! The Titanfall series was originally released for the Xbox and soon after introduced to the PC. Titanfall fans have ranted and complained about the singleplayer of the original Titanfall, saying that devs did not put enough time into it and it lacked certain aspects that gamers wanted. If you are one of those players, Respawn is pleased to say that their latest game will be filled with a new action-packed singleplayer story. In an interview with Forbes, one of the developers had said, "We are doing our best to deliver a vision of grand global colonial warfare retelling the story of the American Revolution and the American Civil War in space." No gameplay is out at this time, but the devs say the multiplayer experience will be twice as epic as their first Titanfall game.

[url=http://gamerant.com/zelda-wii-u-nx-male-female-link-rumor/][b][color=white]Rumor: Zelda Wii U Will Have Male and Female Link[/color][/b][/url]
The iconic high-fantasy action-adventure video game created by Nintendo might be introducing a new flare to their latest Legend of Zelda game. a Nintendo blogger by the name of Emily Rogers has recently released to the public three new characters that may be introduced to the LoZ franchise. Emily Rogers claims that the newest version of the main character, Link, will include a female counterpart option with new voice acting and a new player model. Whether you will be able to switch between a male or female character is still a mystery until more information about the game is announced. Emily tells the gaming community to not trust her word just yet. She explains how all the information she has gathered was from online forums and various other sources. The new game in the series has been titled Hyrule Warriors Legends and will be available for Wii U, Nintendo 3DS, and the new Nintendo NX port. A kid sister-like to Link was seen in the trailer for the new game. Her name is "Linkle" and she is well trained in close quarter combat, with a signature move called the "spin kick". A video released with her can be seen [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6K2m6RO_Iq0]here[/url]. More rumors have sparked, striking up a conversation between fans due to the fact that Nintendo has stated Linkle is has been a rejected character. A lot can change in a few months. What do you think will happen to Linkle?

[align=left]
[color=white][url=http://www.wired.com/2016/04/senates-draft-encryption-bill-privacy-nightmare/][b]The Senate’s Draft Encryption Bill Will Effectively Ban Strong Encryption[/b][/url][/color]
The draft of a Senate bill effectively banning strong encryption in the United States was announced early Friday morning, delivering the latest thunderclap in a worldwide political storm over encryption technology, cybersecurity, and privacy. The draft is being finalized by the senior lawmakers on the Senate Intelligence Committee, Republican chairman Richard Burr of North Carolina and ranking Democrat Dianne Feinstein of California. The senators said in a statement the bill does not establish any new civil or criminal penalties for companies unable to comply, simply stating companies "must provide in a timely manner responsive, intelligible information or data, or appropriate technical assistance to obtain such information."

[color=white][url=http://time.com/money/4285562/netflix-price-hike-subscriptions/][b]Grandfathered Users of Netflix Monthly Rate Set to Increase[/b][/url][/color]
The days of getting high-definition streaming via a Netflix account that you can share with a friend for less than $8 a month are coming to an end, the company says. Those of us who subscribed to Netflix before it was cool have for the last several months enjoyed a grandfathered subscription price of $7.99 per month. However, starting next month their prices will increase to $9.99 per month to match the price increase Netflix implemented for new subscribers starting last year. Approximately 35% of customers — or around 17 million customers — are still on the grandfathered rate, so that means millions of people are going to be paying more for the service starting in May.

[color=white][url=https://www.teslamotors.com/blog/the-week-electric-vehicles-went-mainstream][b]Tesla Model 3 Preorders Top 325,000[/b][/url][/color]
Even the most optimistic of Tesla enthusiasts could not have predicted how high demand for the Tesla Model 3 would turn out to be. In the week since it was announced, more than 325,000 people have pre-ordered the electric sedan, amounting to more than $14 billion in projected sales for a car that Tesla will not even start making until late next year. According to Tesla, this enormous figure makes the Model 3's release "the single biggest one-week launch of any product ever." "This interest has spread completely organically," the company also stated. "Unlike other major product launches, we haven't advertised or paid for any endorsements."
